Drag and drop can also be enabled in insert mode by setting the option to . For drag and drop to work properly, the terminal emulator must meet the following requirements: 1. The terminal emulator must paste the file path or URL to the image when it is dropped into the terminal. 2. The text must be inserted in bracketed paste mode, which allows Neovim to differentiate pasted text from typed-in text. This is required because the drag and drop feature is implemented by overriding .
